thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 4 of 68
thread.title: Andrew Sullivan

author: Andrew Sullivan
title: Andrew Sullivan
text: I bought For Honor three days before release. They assured me that it would be here on the 14th (the release date of the game). It wasn't. I complained and was fully expected to be refunded and that's it. However, Gamecheap issued me a full refund and gave me the game for free! Wow, I don't think I've ever experienced such great customer service! Just because of this, they deserve 5 stars. Would recommend and plan on shopping here again!
